\[ \begin{gathered} \delta \chi / \delta w(x)=\left(\delta x / \delta w^{1}(x), \ldots, \delta \chi / \delta w^{3}(x)\right), \\ \delta^{2} \chi / \delta w^{j}(x) \delta w(x) \end{gathered} \]
